relatedAITools.heading: Related AI Tools
relatedAITools.description: Discover more amazing AI tools for your photos

items.question: What image formats are compatible?
items.answer: We support JPG, PNG, and WebP formats. Ensure your images are high-resolution for the best results.

items.question: Can I control the intensity of the blur?
items.answer: Yes! You can easily adjust the blur intensity to achieve the desired background effect.

items.question: How does the AI know which areas to focus on?
items.answer: You select the focus points manually, allowing the AI to seamlessly blur the rest of the image.

items.question: Is there a limit to how many images I can enhance?
items.answer: No! You can enhance multiple images with no restrictions; just upload and generate as many as you need.

items.question: Do I need any special software to use this tool?
items.answer: No special software or downloads are required; everything is done through our online platform.

items.question: What pricing model do you use for the Bokeh Generator?
items.answer: We offer a pay-as-you-go model, ensuring you only pay for the effects you apply—no subscriptions.

items.question: How quickly can I download my enhanced images?
items.answer: Generation time is typically 1-2 minutes, allowing for fast delivery of your bokeh-enhanced images.

items.question: Do I retain rights to the images I enhance?
items.answer: Yes! You own full commercial rights to all images processed through our platform.

items.question: What support do you offer if something goes wrong?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive support through documentation, tutorials, and customer service.
